title: Which Mac Studio model should you buy? Tests show two factors are key
content:
9to5Mac readers got a few days’ advance notice of Apple’s latest desktop computer – but if you’re in the market for one, which Mac Studio model should you buy? Or should you buy at all?

Apple in two versions, M1 Max and M1 Ultra. The former runs the same chip as the top-end MacBook Pro, while the M1 Ultra is – on paper – in a whole new league …

more…

The post Which Mac Studio model should you buy? Tests show two factors are key appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: If you're in the market for Apple's latest desktop computer, which Mac Studio model should you buy – the M1 Max or M1 Ultra?
